title: @riot - is gangplank still in your sights?
body:
I remember hearing a while ago Riot was planning on changing gangplank, it scared me then and it scares me now.
i'm not sure if you are actually still considering it because I was away for quite some time, but it would be nice to be updated on that.

edit: I was meant to add a poll for this, sorry; if any other players read this, do you think gp needs a change?

replies.body:
Gangplank is fun as he is IMO
Great champ, all he needs is better ratios and nothing else, don't change his abilities just because they don't fit the "everyone has a skillshot, knockup and dash" meta

> [{quoted}](name=toonpang,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=904X2gQO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-27T00:35:27.884+0000)
>
> Gangplank is fun as he is IMO
> Great champ, all he needs is better ratios and nothing else, don't change his abilities just because they don't fit the "everyone has a skillshot, knockup and dash" meta

well I think if his E really wants to be useful to anyone else (since gp is guaranteed to build crit almost) it needs a serious buff.
although I think the rest of him is fine, maybe needs something to aid his mana pool every now and then but then again that's probably meant to be part of the challenge of playing him (if there is one)

I haven't played him in a while

Riot "plan" to change most the older champions in to ones that are more viable. It takes a very very very long time though. I mean, the Sion change took like over 2 years after Riot hinted at changing him.

Here is the official list of champions currently up for changes: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884
thank you barry you make me a happy poro
